organizationId.description: ID of the organization that owns the service.

backupPeriodInHours.description: The interval in hours between each backup.

backupRetentionPeriodInHours.description: The minimum duration in hours for which the backups are available.

backupStartTime.description: The time in HH:MM format for the backups to be performed (evaluated in UTC timezone). When defined the backup period resets to every 24 hours.
